update user_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_url = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_ just_url = #{id justUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_ back_url = #{id backUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, expert_id = #{expertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=CHAR} where user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ui.name name ,ubd.doctor_id id from user_info ui LEFT JOIN user_bind_doctor ubd ON ui.user_id = ubd.user_id where ui.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ubd.doctor_type = '2' and ubd.is_bind = '1'
